title: Homestead National Monument of America: Video Demonstrations
body: Video Demonstrations       Farming was a key factor to the success of a homesteader.  Click on one of the following demonstrations to watch and learn how homesteaders plowed, planted and harvested the land. Plowing and Planting [3 minutes][wmv file] Corn Harvest [3 minutes][wmv file] Grain Harvest [3 minutes 30 seconds][wmv file]
